result.reason: The feature request is currently too broad and stale to implement because it lacks validated latest-build behavior and concrete acceptance criteria.
result.approach: Request a retest on v1.79.x/upstream dev with explicit requirements for dynamic folder sources, refresh rules, filtering logic, and expected UI behavior, then scope implementation from that spec.
